statements: SELECT * FROM nft_table
SELECT id, nft_name FROM nft_table WHERE owner_address = '0x123456789'
SELECT nft_name, owner_address FROM nft_table WHERE is_sold = TRUE
SELECT id, owner_address FROM nft_table WHERE is_sold = FALSE
SELECT id, nft_name, owner_address FROM nft_table ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT id, nft_name, owner_address, is_sold FROM nft_table;
SELECT * FROM nft_table WHERE is_sold = TRUE;
SELECT nft_name, owner_address, id, is_sold FROM nft_table WHERE owner_address LIKE '0x%';
SELECT nft_name, id FROM nft_table WHERE owner_address IN ('0x123456', '0x987654');
SELECT * FROM nft_table ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM NFTs WHERE id = 1
SELECT name, price FROM NFTs WHERE is_sold = FALSE
SELECT max(price) AS highest_price FROM NFTs
SELECT * FROM NFTTransactions ORDER BY date_sold DESC
SELECT owner, count(*) AS total_nfts_owned FROM NFTs GROUP BY owner
SELECT id, name, price FROM NFTs WHERE is_sold = TRUE ORDER BY price DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT name, price FROM NFTs WHERE owner = 'Alice' AND is_sold = FALSE;
SELECT * FROM NFTs WHERE price > 100.00 AND is_sold = FALSE ORDER BY price ASC LIMIT 5 OFFSET 2;
SELECT nft_id, buyer, date_sold FROM NFTTransactions WHERE date_sold >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY date_sold DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT owner, COUNT(*) AS num_owned FROM NFTs GROUP BY owner HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY num_owned DESC;
SELECT * FROM NFTs;
SELECT name, owner_id FROM NFTs;
SELECT * FROM Sales ORDER BY sale_time DESC;
SELECT nft_id, amount FROM Sales WHERE amount > 100;
SELECT owner_id, COUNT(*) FROM Ownerships GROUP BY owner_id;
SELECT * FROM NFTs WHERE owner_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT name, description FROM NFTs WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001' ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT nft_id, amount, sale_time FROM Sales WHERE buyer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174002' ORDER BY sale_time ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT nft_id, owner_id, transfer_time FROM Ownerships WHERE owner_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174003' AND nft_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174004';
SELECT MAX(amount) AS highest_amount, MIN(amount) AS lowest_amount FROM Sales WHERE sale_time >= '2022-01-01' AND sale_time <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM NFT
SELECT id, name, creator FROM NFT ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT id, name, creator FROM User WHERE id = 5
SELECT id, from_user, to_user, amount FROM Transaction WHERE amount > 1000
SELECT * FROM OwnershipTransfer ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT * FROM NFT WHERE category='Art' ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT nft_id, COUNT(*) as total_owners FROM OwnershipTransfer GROUP BY nft_id HAVING total_owners > 5
SELECT u.username, t.transaction_amount FROM User u INNER JOIN Transaction t ON u.user_id = t.buyer_id WHERE t.transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT u.username, COUNT(*) as total_transactions FROM User u LEFT JOIN Transaction t ON u.user_id = t.buyer_id GROUP BY u.username ORDER BY total_transactions DESC
SELECT nft_id, MAX(transaction_amount) as max_price FROM Transaction GROUP BY nft_id ORDER BY max_price DESC
SELECT * FROM NFTs;
SELECT nft_name, owner_id FROM NFTs ORDER BY nft_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM Users WHERE address LIKE '%New York%';
SELECT sale_id, sale_amount FROM Sales WHERE sale_amount > 1000 ORDER BY sale_amount ASC;
SELECT * FROM NFTs ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT nft_name, owner_id FROM NFTs WHERE is_sold = TRUE;
SELECT Users.username, Transactions.trans_date FROM Users JOIN Transactions ON Users.user_id = Transactions.buyer_id WHERE Transactions.trans_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT NFTs.nft_name, Sales.sale_amount FROM NFTs JOIN Sales ON NFTs.id = Sales.trans_id WHERE Sales.sale_amount > 1000;

SELECT Users.username AS seller, nft_name, Sale_amount FROM Users JOIN Sales ON Users.user_id = Sales.seller_id JOIN NFTs ON NFTs.id = Sales.trans_id WHERE Sale_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY Sale_amount DESC;
